q1.name: Knuckle Down
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sett''' empowers his next two [[basic attack]]s within 5 seconds to gain {{sti|50 '''bonus''' range}} and deal {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}, capped at 400 '''total''' damage of each attack against {{tip|monsters}}.{{bug|}}
For {{fd|1.5}} seconds, '''Sett''' also gains {{sti|movement speed|{{as|30% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} when he moves towards {{tip|sight|visible}} enemy {{tip|champions}} within 2000 units.

''Knuckle Down'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Sett's''' basic attack timer. The empowered attacks are guaranteed to be a {{as|Left Punch|Armor}} followed by a {{as|Right Punch|buzzword3}}, resetting '''Sett's''' current {{ai|Pit Grit|Sett}} state (if applicable) and ignoring the usual time-out period for a follow-up {{as|Right Punch|buzzword3}}.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Sett empowers his next two basic attacks within 5 seconds to gain 50 bonus range and deal bonus physical damage, capped at 400 total damage of each attack against monsters.Unknown value: bug
For 1.5 seconds, Sett also gains 30% bonus movement speed when he moves towards visible enemy champions within 2000 units.
Knuckle Down resets Sett's basic attack timer. The empowered attacks are guaranteed to be a Left Punch followed by a Right Punch, resetting Sett's current Pit Grit state (if applicable) and ignoring the usual time-out period for a follow-up Right Punch.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Physical Damage|{{ap|10 to 50}} {{as|(+ 1% {{as|(+ {{ap|1 to 3}}% per 100 AD)}} of target's '''maximum''' health)}}|Total Bonus Damage|{{ap|10*2 to 50*2}} {{as|(+ 2% {{as|(+ {{ap|1*2 to 3*2}}% per 100 AD)}} of target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}
q1.notes:
* The bonus movement speed buff is named ''Looking For a Fight''.
* ''Knuckle Down'' can be {{tip|dodged}}, {{tip|blocked}} or missed while '''Sett''' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.
* Due to the way the damage cap against {{tip|monsters}} is implemented, ''Knuckle Down'' may deal less damage to monsters at high amounts of {{as|AD}} than '''Sett's''' basic attacks.{{bug}}
** If the attack {{tip|critical strike|critically strikes}}, the capped damage will.

effects.str:
• Bonus Physical Damage: (+ 1% (+ % per 100 AD) of target's maximum health)
  • Total Bonus Damage: (+ 2% (+ % per 100 AD) of target's maximum health)

st_slices: (+ 1% (+ % per 100 AD) of target's '''maximum''' health)
(+ 2% (+ % per 100 AD) of target's '''maximum''' health)

e1.name: Facebreaker
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sett''' {{tip|airborne|pulls in}} enemies at his front and back in the target direction, dealing them {{as|physical damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 50% for {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
If ''Facebreaker'' affects at least one enemy on each side, all enemies are {{tip|stun|stunned}} for 1 second upon landing.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Sett pulls in enemies at his front and back in the target direction, dealing them physical damage and slowing them by 50% for 0.5 seconds.
If Facebreaker affects at least one enemy on each side, all enemies are stunned for 1 second upon landing.
e1.notes:
* '''Sett''' will attempt to basic attack the closest target after ''Facebreaker''.
* A target will rebound to '''Sett's''' '''base''' attack range.
* There is a smaller affected area at '''Sett's''' sides, the [[spell indicator]] does not illustrate this for practical reasons.
* If targets on either opposite side are protected by {{tip|spell shield|spell shields}}, ''Facebreaker'' will not {{tip|stun}}.

r1.name: The Show Stopper
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sett''' {{tip|dashes}} with {{tip|displacement immunity}} a {{tt|fixed distance|400 units past target location}} over {{fd|1.5}} seconds toward and past the target enemy {{tip|champion}}, {{tip|attach|attaching}} the target to him upon arrival and {{tip|suppression|suppressing}} them for the duration, during which they are also {{tip|true sight|revealed}}. Upon completing the dash, '''Sett''' slams the target into the ground, creating a massive shockwave at the impact area.

Enemies within the epicenter take {{ccs|{{as|physical damage}}|physical}}. Enemies outside of the epicenter but within the impact area take {{as|physical damage}}, reduced by up to 75% at the edge. All enemies hit are {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 99% for 1 second.
''The dash will prematurely end upon reaching a wall that cannot be dashed through by '''Sett'''.''
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Sett dashes with displacement immunity a fixed distance over 1.5 seconds toward and past the target enemy champion, attaching the target to him upon arrival and suppressing them for the duration, during which they are also revealed. Upon completing the dash, Sett slams the target into the ground, creating a massive shockwave at the impact area.
Enemies within the epicenter take physical damage physical">Unknown value: ccs physical damage physical. Enemies outside of the epicenter but within the impact area take physical damage, reduced by up to 75% at the edge. All enemies hit are slowed by 99% for 1 second.
The dash will prematurely end upon reaching a wall that cannot be dashed through by Sett.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|200 to 400}} {{as|(+ 120% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|40 to 60}}% of primary target's '''bonus''' health)}}|Minimum Physical Damage|{{ap|200*0.25 to 400*0.25}} {{as|(+ 30% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ {{ap|40*0.25 to 60*0.25}}% of primary target's '''bonus''' health)}}}}
r1.notes:
* '''Sett''' lands 200 units farther from the impact, the damage is applied after the time it takes to reposition.
* '''Sett''' will dash from ''The Show Stopper'' even if the target resists the {{tip|attach|attachment}} or detaches from him, which can be done so by negating or removing the {{tip|suppression}}. This includes if the target:
** Has a {{tip|spell shield}}.
** Is {{tip|cc-immune|crowd control immune}} or {{tip|displacement immune}}.
** Uses a {{tip|cleanse|cleansing}} effect, either before or after the attachment.
** {{tip|Death|Dies}} or enters {{tip|resurrection}}.
** Is {{ai|Devour|Tahm Kench|Devoured}}.
* '''Sett''' will only attach the target to him if they are still suppressed upon his arrival.
* If the dash is interrupted, the target will be detached from '''Sett''' and the suppression will end immediately.
** If '''Sett''' enters {{tip|resurrection}} the moment before the attachment, '''Sett''' will continue to perform the dash.{{bug}}
* If the target is {{tip|untargetable}} upon '''Sett's''' arrival, he will stop the dash immediately.
* If the target is 2000 or more units away before '''Sett's''' arrival, he will not attach them to him. The {{tip|suppression}} will last 5 seconds in this case.{{bug}}
* The "crater" VFX does not represent the entire explosion radius. Additionally, the explosion radius is non-uniform.{{bug|2}}

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 120% bonus AD) (+ % of primary target's bonus health)
  • Minimum Physical Damage: (+ 30% bonus AD) (+ % of primary target's bonus health)

st_slices: (+ 120% '''bonus''' AD) (+ % of primary target's '''bonus''' health)
(+ 30% '''bonus''' AD) (+ % of primary target's '''bonus''' health)

w1.name: Haymaker
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Sett''' stores 100% of {{tt|post-mitigation damage|Damage calculated after resistances and modifiers.}} taken as ''Grit'' on his resource bar, up to {{as|50% of his {{sti|'''maximum''' health}}}}. Each instance of stored ''Grit'' decays by 30% every second after 4 seconds.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Sett''' immediately gains a {{tip|shield}} equal to his expended ''Grit'' for 3 seconds, decaying after {{fd|0.75}} seconds, and charges up a strike over the cast time.

After the cast time, he unleashes a blast in a cone in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies within the area, and {{ccs|{{as|true damage}}|true}} instead to all those in the center.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Sett stores 100% of post-mitigation damage taken as Grit on his resource bar, up to 50% of his maximum health. Each instance of stored Grit decays by 30% every second after 4 seconds.
Active: Sett immediately gains a shield equal to his expended Grit for 3 seconds, decaying after 0.75 seconds, and charges up a strike over the cast time.
After the cast time, he unleashes a blast in a cone in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies within the area, and true damage true">Unknown value: ccs true damage true instead to all those in the center.
w1.notes:
* The shield is created immediately and will decay after the blast delay. 
** The buff for the shield is named ''Down But Not Out''.
* '''Sett''' does not store {{as|Grit|gold}} from damage that was mitigated by {{tip|shield|shields}}.
* ''Haymaker'' will cast from wherever '''Sett''' is at the end of the cast time.
* '''Sett''' will turn towards the target direction at the start of the cast time.
* {{si|Flash}} can be used during ''Haymaker'''s cast time
* '''Sett''' will glow when attaining 90% {{as|Grit|gold}}. Casting ''Haymaker'' at this amount has a different visual and audio effect.
[[File:90%_Grit_Sett.png|thumb|left|'''Sett''' will turn {{color|#FFDF00|'''golden'''}} ''(base skin)''.]]
w1.cost_warn: Wiki's and Riot's mana costs do not match: Wiki's value  100 as 100 and riot's value 0,0,0,0,0 as 0

effects.str: • Damage: (+ 25% (+ 20% per 100 bonus AD) of expended Grit)

i1.name: Pit Grit
description: {{sbc|Innate - Heavy Hands:}} '''Sett's''' basic attacks alternate between a {{as|Left Punch|armor}} and a {{as|Right Punch|buzzword3}} {{tip|on-attack}}. '''Sett''' begins attacking with a {{as|Left Punch|armor}}, and will reset back to it after 2 seconds of not performing a {{as|Right Punch|buzzword3}}.

'''Sett's''' {{as|Right Punch|buzzword3}} gains {{sti|range|50 '''bonus''' range}}, unless {{ai|Knuckle Down|Sett}} is active, attacks at 8 times the {{as|Left Punch's|armor}} {{as|attack speed}}, and deals {{as|{{pp|5 to 90}}|physical damage}} {{as|(+ 50% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.

{{sbc|Innate - Heart of the Half-Beast:}} '''Sett''' {{sti|health regeneration|link=true|regenerates}} an additional {{ft|{{as|{{pp|0.25;0.5;1;2|1 to 16 for 4}} health}} per second for every {{as|5% of his {{sti|'''missing''' health}}}}.|up-to {{as|{{pp|4.75;9.5;19;38|1 to 16 for 4}} health}} per second (maximum reached at {{sti|95% '''missing''' health}}).}}
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate - Heavy Hands: Sett's basic attacks alternate between a Left Punch and a Right Punch on-attack. Sett begins attacking with a Left Punch, and will reset back to it after 2 seconds of not performing a Right Punch.
Sett's Right Punch gains 50 bonus range, unless Knuckle Down is active, attacks at 8 times the Left Punch's attack speed, and deals 5undefined − 90undefined (based on level) (+ 50% bonus AD) bonus physical damage.
Innate - Heart of the Half-Beast: Sett regenerates an additional
